definition: impression or feeling after visiting or watching (movies, museums etc)
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: I advised writing an article after visiting the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我建议在参观展览后写一篇观后感。

sentences.english: For those who interested to read the review I wrote for this movie, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 有兴趣阅读我对这部电影的观后感，请点击这里。

sentences.english: I have been working on records, records that every section of Guan Hougan, I would like to.
sentences.chinese: 一直在做记录，记录看到每一段的观后感，我想。

sentences.english: The movie is about the Wall Street "about it."
sentences.chinese: 是关于电影《华尔街》的观后感的。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Hotel Supplies Exhibition tour experience and Feedback.
sentences.chinese: 参观广州酒店用品展的经验和观后感。

sentences.english: I would love to watch T. V. and write great reviews!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢看电视和写一长篇的观后感。

definition: impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
afterthought/reflection after an event/a review (of a movie etc)
variant of 紀錄片|纪录片[ji4 lu4 pian4]
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
